text: Sergey Lisunov (born October 12, 1986) is a Russian professional water polo player. He is currently playing for WPC Dynamo Moscow. He is 6 ft 6 in (1.98 m) tall and weighs 251 lb (114 kg).EUROPEAN WATER POLO CHAMPIONSHIPS TEAM RUSSIA / MEN == Family == He is married to the water polo player Ekaterina Lisunova, they have a son.Кто отыщет тайные сокровища Казани? Семейная пара – Сергей и Екатерина Лисуновы – возглавят «сборные дебютантов». sport- weekend.com (23 July 2015)ЕКАТЕРИНА ЛИСУНОВА: «На первом месте у меня всегда муж и сынуля» . ugranow.ru (16 July 2013) ==References== ==External links== * Sergey Lisunov on Instagram * Sergey Lisunov on Facebook * Sergey Lisunov on web.archive.org * Капитану сборной России жена подарит второго ребенка * vk.com Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Russian male water polo players
title: Sergey Lisunov
